text: Nassarius delicatus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 6 mm and 14 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea, in the Indo-West Pacific and off La Réunion. ==References== * Cernohorsky W. O. (1984). Systematics of the family Nassariidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Bulletin of the Auckland Institute and Museum 14: 1–356. * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp ==External links== * Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1852
title: Nassarius delicatus
